description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Oriental and Western Siberia; a narrative of seven years' explorations and adventures in Siberia, Mongolia, the Kirghis Steppes, Chinese Tartary, and part of Central Asia ... With a map and numerous illustrations" Author: ATKINSON, Thomas Witlam. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010058.ff.4." Page: 602 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1858 Publisher: Hurst & Blackett Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000136223 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
